content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’m here to assist you with any plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs. May I have your name to get started?
I want to speak to a manager right now! This is ridiculous!
I understand you’d like to speak to a manager. I’m here to help as best I can. Could you please tell me what issue you are experiencing so I can assist you promptly?
I’m not here for nonsense. I want a real person right now, not some robot!
I’m connecting you with a human operator now to address your concerns directly. Please hold on.
